revised_title: Oxidation of Glycol and Salts of Glyoxylic Acid
tldr: The author investigates the oxidation of glycol and the formation of various salts of glyoxylic acid. The study reveals the relationship between glyoxylic, oxalic, and glycolic acids, as well as the potential formation of glyoxal from glycol. The author also describes the synthesis and properties of several glyoxylic acid salts.
